summary: Theme toggle and persistence appear implemented via a new useTheme hook (localStorage + prefers-color-scheme) and a header toggle button that applies/removes the `dark` class on `document.documentElement`. No immutable files are shown as modified. One unrelated UX change (HintsPanel initial visibility behavior) appears to be included but was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: HintsPanel/QuestionSections behavior change to show the first hint immediately when the hints section is opened (new `initialVisibleCount` prop).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is solely about light/dark theme support, header toggle, and persistence; it does not request changes to hints UX/visibility logic.
